meanings.sent2: She visited the museum last week.
meanings.sent3: The cat visited the fish tank, but luckily the fish were safe.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts visited the memories of his childhood.
meanings.sent5: The idea of going back in time visited her dreams frequently.

meanings.definition: to go to see or spend time with (someone)
meanings.sent1: We visited our neighbors for tea.
meanings.sent2: They visited their friends over the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a penguin visiting a polar bear is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness visited everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of joy always visited her when she saw her family.
